title: Got a game with rainbowwindslah
body: Started game and got him on my team awwwww yeah

replies.body: am i supposed to know who that is ?
He is known for being a Riven main and known for being the ONLY Riven who cant escape bronze.

>

and is 12 years old :P

Ye but still me mum won't let me do what I want, like srs mum I'm 12 now I do whatever I wish.

Can confirm ecks deeeeee

lol, such hate for rainbow, for those who don't know him, he was a regular on the old forums ( {{item:3070}} RIP {{item:3070}} ), and for those who say he feeds, not so bad, was a good game, no rage, very salty enemies tho
how can anyone in bronze be known for anything ?
